The KSO texture pack for FusTek is gorgeous. Can NOT wait for the super25. You are the man Helldiver!

There's a KSO texture pack for FusTek?

There's a KSO texture pack for FusTek?

Yes, someone made one that fits with the KSO theme quite nicely.
release it... release it...

release it... release it...

It will come out when it is ready.

Yes, someone made one that fits with the KSO theme quite nicely.

Found: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35043-0-23-5-FusTek-Station-Parts-%28X0-04-4-DEV-BUILD-5-June-2014%29?p=1092391&viewfull=1#post1092391

Cheers
Do you have plans to make the super 25 launch system into its own separate launch vehicle? It looks easy to do.
helldiver's streaming at the moment: http://www.twitch.tv/fanbus

Do you have plans to make the super 25 launch system into its own separate launch vehicle? It looks easy to do.

As in making the EFT and LRBS their own launcher without the Super 25? No, probably not.
He is streaming at www.twitch.tv/fanbus CONFIRMED!
can't wait, have a new communications satellite ready for it.
Stream is over.

Just a quick question... How do I make exceptions in ATM so I can see the additional cockpits at full resolution? Resolute comes in crystal clear, but all the others are fuzzy. I dug around in the config files a bit, and I think I saw where the exceptions should go, but I want to get the info from an expert rather than hack and slash my way into a problem.

Just a quick question... How do I make exceptions in ATM so I can see the additional cockpits at full resolution? Resolute comes in crystal clear, but all the others are fuzzy. I dug around in the config files a bit, and I think I saw where the exceptions should go, but I want to get the info from an expert rather than hack and slash my way into a problem.

I think helldiver said he would be posting how to do that when Phase 3 is released.

I think helldiver said he would be posting how to do that when Phase 3 is released.

Yep, although I need to clear with the ATM team about including their mod in KSOS, since it is now required. Otherwise the KSOS file will include an ATM replacement config file so that all the KSOS stuff appears correct. Standard ATM and aggressive severely damages the KSO 25s tiles do to the 512x512 image limit on Normal maps.
Cool, I can hold out a bit more for clear textures then.

The 64th of my STS KSO Shuttle Missions! STS 164 is the 20th flight of Rebellious & first in 0.23.5. STS 164's objective is to deploy the Laythe Space Station Habitat Module #1! Jeb and the Rebels weren't happy about being phased out in favor of the KSO Super 25 EWBCL and have permanently moved the mini shuttle program to Laythe!

The Laythe Space Station Construction Missions run STS 159-STS 170 and uses the Phase II KSO Station Parts!
I am thinking of making a mod of a lander that will fit inside the cargo bay of the mini shuttle. More will be announced as my ideas develop of this KSO lander mod.

I am thinking of making a mod of a lander that will fit inside the cargo bay of the mini shuttle. More will be announced as my ideas develop of this KSO lander mod.

Sweet! I have made a few landers for the KSO so be sure to check out my videos for inspiration!
The thing is my rig is so old it can't run the game and its very expensive to build the rig I am planning on so it might be a while

Building a new station wich is based on the concept of Dual Keel Station. But with the new shuttle arround the corner I had to slow down design . This is what I've got so far.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Building a new station wich is based on the concept of Dual Keel Station. But with the new shuttle arround the corner I had to slow down design . This is what I've got so far.

http://imgur.com/a/UvMty

That looks pretty cool, if a bit complicated.

That looks pretty cool, if a bit complicated.

Yes true, but I'll keep part count down by welding some of the truss sections. And it's also based on this design

Yes true, but I'll keep part count down by welding some of the truss sections. And it's also based on this design

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/fd/Dualkeel86.JPG

How do you plan on getting it all into orbit?

How do you plan on getting it all into orbit?

Haven't really worked that part out yet, I still have to figure out what parts to weld together for lowest part count and still be able to get into orbit without cheating.

But I love the idea of sending stuff up with the shuttle and then transfer it at a station to send to other planets. The concept was originaly envisioned by NASA to replace

the Apolla program but due to budget cuts never carried out.
Here's hoping for a release within a week. Because if it takes longer than that, it'll be further 3 weeks before I get a chance to play with it
